field.value: Get an instance of IQueryOver with ActiveRecord gracefully

field.name: description
field.value: I use DetachedCriteria primarily, it has a static method For to construct an instance. But it seems IQueryOver is more favourable, I want to use it. The normal way to get an instance of IQueryOver is Isession.Query, and I want get it with ActiveRecord gracefully.
